Skills.Name: Silence Conductor
Skills.Description: Grants <code=200,param=1000><color=#3398f1>Demon Power</color> on self for 10s. Inflicts 3-hit DMG (<color=red>{1}%</color> + <color=red>{2}%</color> + <color=red>{3}%</color>) on all enemies.
Skills.ShortDescription: Grants "Demon Power" on self. Inflicts 3-hit DMG on all enemies

Skills.Name: Violet Nova
Skills.Description: Raises ATK of all allies by <color=red>{0}%</color> for 10s. Further increases ATK by <color=red>{1}%</color> for 10s if Red Elemental.
Skills.ShortDescription: Raises ATK of all allies. Further increases ATK if Red Elemental

Skills.Name: Atomic Duo
Skills.Description: Inflicts 2-hit DMG (<color=red>{0}%</color> + <color=red>{1}%</color>) on single enemy. Inflicts 2-hit DMG ({2}% + {3}%) on all enemies.
Skills.ShortDescription: Inflicts 2-hit DMG on single enemy. Inflicts 2-hit DMG on all enemies

Skills.Name: Strike Combo
Skills.Description: Inflicts <color=red>75.00%-1500.00%</color> DMG on all enemies within 100 cm of target enemy according to Combo Bonus.
Skills.ShortDescription: Inflicts DMG on all enemies within range

Skills.Name: Reign of Violet Light
Skills.Description: Each time a Red Elemental ally activates Normal Attack, raises DMG Received for all enemies by <color=red>{0}%</color> for 10s. Raises own DMG Inflicted by {1}% for 10s.
Skills.ShortDescription: Each time a Red Elemental ally activates Normal Attack, raises DMG Received for all enemies. Raises own DMG Inflicted

Skills.Name: Silence Conductor +
Skills.Description: Grants 2x <code=200,param=1000><color=#3398f1>Demon Power</color> on self for 10s. Inflicts 3-hit DMG (<color=red>{2}%</color> + <color=red>{3}%</color> + <color=red>{4}%</color>) on all enemies.
Skills.ShortDescription: Grants "Demon Power" on self. Inflicts 3-hit DMG on all enemies

Skills.Name: Violet Nova +
Skills.Description: Raises ATK of all allies by <color=red>{0}%</color> for 13s. Further increases ATK by <color=red>{1}%</color> for 13s if Red Elemental.
Skills.ShortDescription: Raises ATK of all allies. Further increases ATK if Red Elemental

Skills.Name: Atomic Duo +
Skills.Description: Inflicts 2-hit DMG (<color=red>{0}%</color> + <color=red>{1}%</color>) on single enemy. Inflicts 2-hit DMG ({2}% + {3}%) on all enemies.
Skills.ShortDescription: Inflicts 2-hit DMG on single enemy. Inflicts 2-hit DMG on all enemies

Skills.Name: Reign of Violet Light +
Skills.Description: Each time a Red Elemental ally activates Normal Attack, raises DMG Received for all enemies by <color=red>{0}%</color> for 10s. Raises own DMG Inflicted by {1}% for 10s.
Skills.ShortDescription: Each time a Red Elemental ally activates Normal Attack, raises DMG Received for all enemies. Raises own DMG Inflicted

Skills.Name: Reign of Violet Light: Shadow & Aurora Only
Skills.Description: Each time a Red Elemental ally activates Hidden Technique, raises Speed of all allies by <color=red>{0}%</color> for 60s. Also raises DMG Inflicted by <color=red>{1}%</color> for 60s. Further <code=200,param=115><color=#3398f1>shields</color> DMG (<color=red>{2}%</color> of skill user's ATK) for 15s.
Skills.ShortDescription: Each time a Red Elemental ally activates Hidden Technique, raises Speed and DMG Inflicted, shields DMG of all allies
